synopsis:
A girl, Aya, who grew up without knowing that she was the daughter of a witch, was taken away to a strange house one day and ended up living with a mean witch. Miyazaki Goro, who won the International Emmy Award for his previous work, Ronya, the Bandit's Daughter, will work on the feature-length animation, which will be the latest feature animation of Studio Ghibli.

(Source: NHK)
